record.field:
Hello,

A password reset was requested for the Robo account linked to this email.

You may change your password by following this link which will remain valid during 24 hours:

Change password

If you do not expect this, you can safely ignore this email.

Best regards,

RoboLabs Team
ROBOLABS
Buhalterija šiuolaikiškai

You have been invited to connect to "${object.company_id.name}" on Robo platform.

To accept the invitation, click on the following link:

Accept invitation to "${object.company_id.name}"

Best regards,

RoboLabs Team
